mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.member_no, m.member_nick, m.member_name, mp.attachment_no FROM follow f INNER JOIN member m ON f.follow_follower = m.member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN member_profile mp ON mp.member_no = m.member_no WHERE f.member_no = #{memberNo} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM block b WHERE b.block_no = #{memberNo} AND b.member_no = m.member_no ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM block b WHERE b.member_no = #{memberNo} AND b.block_no = m.member_no ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dm_user du JOIN dm_room dr ON du.room_no = dr.room_no JOIN dm_privacy_room dpr ON dr.room_no = dpr.room_no WHERE dr.room_type = 1 AND ( (dpr.inviter_no = #{memberNo} AND dpr.invitee_no = m.member_no) OR (dpr.inviter_no = m.member_no AND dpr.invitee_no = #{memberNo}) ) ) ) ORDER BY dbms_random.value ) WHERE rownum <= 10

SELECT m.member_no, m.member_nick, m.member_name, mp.attachment_no FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member_profile mp ON m.member_no = mp.member_no WHERE m.member_no != #{memberNo} AND m.member_no NOT IN ( SELECT b.member_no FROM block b WHERE b.block_no = #{memberNo} UNION SELECT b.block_no FROM block b WHERE b.member_no = #{memberNo} UNION SELECT du.member_no FROM dm_user du JOIN dm_room dr ON du.room_no = dr.room_no JOIN dm_privacy_room dpr ON dr.room_no = dpr.room_no WHERE dr.room_type = 1 AND ( (dpr.inviter_no = #{memberNo} AND dpr.invitee_no = m.member_no) OR (dpr.inviter_no = m.member_no AND dpr.invitee_no = #{memberNo}) ) UNION SELECT du.member_no FROM dm_user du WHERE du.room_no = #{roomNo} AND du.member_no = m.member_no ) AND (INSTR(m.member_nick, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(m.member_name, #{keyword}) > 0)
